name: FlashDog - GFX Tool for PUBG
description: FlashDog is a game tool designed for FPS mobile games. Support custom graphics, unlock maximum FPS limit and much more other useful options.  [GFX] Set optimal resolution for the game Choose the HDR graphics for your device Unlock maximum FPS limit ustomize your shadows Enable Anti-aliasing or make it even better by X2, X4 And much more other useful options  [Game Tool] Advanced game map Custom crosshair  [Use Tutorial] For the first time, it is recommended to use the reset screen feature to effectively reduce the probability of GFX not taking effect. For users who use GFX for the first time, we recommend using CPU-based GFX. Custom settings, need to click on the customize advanced setting, set the appropriate GFX settings, enter the game (click to PLAY NOW) can take effect You must click on [PLAY NOW] to start the game. Supported game versions: Global, CN, LITE, KR, VN, TW, BETA We are a 100% safe, free application that wont put your game account at any risk.  [LIKE US &STAY CONNECTED] Official Website: http://www.flashdogapp.com/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FlashDogtool/ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsQ4zl8nQMj9qYU4ULIA0ZQ/featured  [DISCLAIMER] This is an UNOFFICIAL application for PUBG. This application is not associated in any way with PUBG Corporation. All rights reserved. In accordance with https://developer.pubg.com/tos?locale=en  PUBG, PLAYERUNKNOWNS BATTLEGROUNDS and all related logos are trademarks of PUBG Corporation or its affiliates.  If you feel that we have violated your intellectual property rights or any other agreement, please contact us by e-mail flashdogfeedback@gmail.com, we will immediately take the necessary measures.
